directions: Grate Cheddar cheese into a bowl and refrigerate while draining peas and dicing onion to keep cheese shreds from sticking together.
Mix cheese, peas, onion, mayonnaise, sugar, salt, and pepper together in a bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 1 hour to overnight.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Crowd-Pleasing Pea Salad
